alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 9:36AM EDT until September 21 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clinton County in south central Michigan... * Until 1030 AM EDT. * At 936 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Carson City to 5 miles southeast of Saranac, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Johns... Grand Ledge... Elsie... DeWitt... Capital Region Inter... Eureka... Ovid... Fowler... Westphalia... Maple Rapids... Hubbardston... Eagle... Wacousta... Abrams Municipal Air... Bath... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
